author: marrs
msg: Improved the way the UI responds to underlying model changes. Instead of rebuilding its models from scratch it now actually tracks changes. Added a progress indicator as a way to "push" updates from the server to the client because our event model is asynchronous. Started work on a way to extend the UI from other bundles.

author: coheigea
msg: - Provided a common set of CallbackHandler implementations for the tests to use, instead of each test providing its own implementation etc.
